titles.title: Addiction Treatment Access Act
Addiction Treatment Access Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of addiction counselor services under part B of the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Addiction Treatment Access Act
This bill provides for Medicare coverage of addiction counselor services that are used to diagnose and treat substance abuse and that would otherwise be covered if provided by a physician, including incidental services, as long as no payment is made to other providers for such services.
